game.title: The Lost Temple of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins of Eldarath.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a powerful artifact hidden deep within the long-abandoned temple of Eldarath. Brave adventurers are needed to explore the treacherous jungle, overcome deadly traps, and retrieve this relic before it falls into the wrong hands.
game.reward: 10,000 gold pieces, a magical amulet granting resistance to poison, and a blessing from the village elder.

task.objective: Navigate through the jungle to reach the temple entrance.
task.description: Be cautious of wild beasts and rival treasure hunters. The path is fraught with danger, but the promise of untold riches awaits those who persevere.

task.objective: Disable the poison dart trap in the temple's entrance hall.
task.description: A pressure plate triggers a deadly hail of poison darts. Find an alternate route or disable the mechanism to proceed safely.

task.objective: Reward the ancient guardian and claim the artifact.
task.description: A powerful entity guards the relic. Prove your worth by solving a series of trials, and you shall be granted the artifact.
